name: InterSet Explorer
description:
Your dream is to work behind the scene of an Hollywood production? You love the Harry Potter saga? So this can be the VR experience for you.

InterSet Explorer brings you to Harry Potter and the Goblet of Fire movie set, where you can set up a scene in Hogwarts.

Put the camera in the right place, switch on the lights and create the perfect atmosphere to record the scene. Explore and interact lots of movie's object, to discover interesting details and curiosities about Harry Potter.

How to play:

This project was realized for the Virtual Reality course at Politecnico di Torino a.a. 2020/2021.

Developers:

  • Decataldo Federico
  • Mazzini Francesca
  • Panza Gianluca
  • Tassino Federico
  • Tavella Simone
